example.name: I don't like this example
example.text: Four tubular steel ``Bedfellows,'' each roughly in the shape of a ``W,'' are attached to the bottom of the box spring in a recessed position.

example.name: bummer
example.text: The court hearing John's case recessed for half an hour while they waited for the stench to dissipate.
